title: Charming and Attractive Res Lease in Austin. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Newly-remodeled, open and spacious 3/2.5 duplex in cool east side neighborhood with new paint, carpet, blinds, etc.
Each unit has three bedrooms and two full baths upstairs, half bath down.
Ceramic tile floors downstairs and carpeting/wood laminate up.
Spacious galley kitchen open to the living room and dining area with ceramic tile countertops, and wood grained cabinets.
A-unit has laminate flooring in all bedrooms upstairs, B-unit has carpeting in all bedrooms.
Nice shade trees and each side has it's own deep, privacy-fenced yard with patio and sprinkler system.
Deep one-car garage with extra storage space.
Quiet neighborhood less than 15 minutes to downtown and UT campus.
Do NOT reply to this ad, please call/text for a fast response.
Listed By: Hal Weiner, City Properties
